## WhereBuilder.eq() method

Add an `=` condition

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
eq<K extends KeyOf<MT>>(key: K, val: MT[K]): this;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  key | <code>K</code> | Property name |
|  val | <code>MT[K]</code> | Property value |
